FuncDef: This command creates a configuration context for the specified IPv6 filter policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 filter policy ID expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies a string of up to 64 characters uniquely identifying this IPv6 filter policy.
This keyword is required to create the configuration context. Once it is created, the context can be enabled with or without the create keyword.

Configures an optional filter name, up to 64 characters in length, to a given filter. This filter name can then be used in configuration references, display, and show commands throughout the system. A defined filter name can help the service provider or administrator to identify and manage filters within the SR OS platforms. Values-name: 		64 characters maximum.

ExtraInfo: Default: No IPv6 filter policy is created by default.
